get.summary: Listing existing sections of a status page

post.summary: Creating a new status page section

parameters.name: status_page_id
parameters.description: The ID of your status page

name.description: The name of the section. Leave blank to hide the section header.

position.description:
The position of this resource on your status page, indexed from zero.

If you don't specify a position, we add the resource to the end of the status page.

When you specify a position of an existing resource, we add the resource to this position and shift resources below to accommodate.

patch.summary: Updating an existing status page section

If you don't specify a position, we add the resource to the end of the status page.

When you specify a position of an existing resource, we add the resource to this position and shift resources below to accommodate.

get.summary: Listing existing reports on a status page

post.summary: Creating a new status page report (with an assosiated status update)

parameters.name: status_page_id
parameters.description: The ID of your status page

schema.example:
curl --request POST \
  --url https://betteruptime.com/api/v2/status-pages/123456/status-reports \
  --header 'Authorization: Bearer YOUR_API_TOKEN' \
  --header 'Content-Type: application/json' \
  --data '{
    "title": "Status report title",
    "message": "Status update message",
    "report_type": "manual",
    "affected_resources": [{"status_page_resource_id": "12345", "status": "downtime"}]
}'

text/plain.example:
curl --request POST \
  --url https://betteruptime.com/api/v2/status-pages/123456/status-reports \
  --header 'Authorization: Bearer YOUR_API_TOKEN' \
  --header 'Content-Type: application/json' \
  --data '{
    "title": "Status report title",
    "message": "Status update message",
    "report_type": "manual",
    "affected_resources": [{"status_page_resource_id": "12345", "status": "downtime"}]
}'
